imdb.plot outline: Producer/Host, Sheree-Monique Roberts sits down with single African-American men and women in their 20s, 30s and 40s to discuss the dating scene in Atlanta. Does Atlanta have its own unique set of dating challenges? Does the ratio of single black men to single black women make it harder for Atlanta singles than other places? Are "hoes" really winning? A group of candid singles explore it all in Finding the One: Young, Black and Single.
imdb.title: Finding the One: Young, Black & Single in Atlanta
akas: Finding the One: Young, Black & Single in Atlanta (United States)
plot: Conversations with singles of various age groups exploring the myths, challenges and inconvenient truths about black single life in Atlanta.

Producer/Host, Sheree-Monique Roberts sits down with single African-American men and women in their 20s, 30s and 40s to discuss the dating scene in Atlanta. Does Atlanta have its own unique set of dating challenges? Does the ratio of single black men to single black women make it harder for Atlanta singles than other places? Are "hoes" really winning? A group of candid singles explore it all in Finding the One: Young, Black and Single.
